text: Carijoa is a genus of soft corals in the family Clavulariidae. ==Species== The World Register of Marine Species includes the following species in the genus: *Carijoa multiflora (Laackman, 1909) *Carijoa operculata (Bayer, 1961) *Carijoa riisei (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1860) *Carijoa rupicola Mueller, 1867 ==References== Category:Alcyonacea
title: Carijoa
